questions.questionTitle: Who are the speakers talking about?
What does the man say about Larry?
anwers: He will stay with the company.
He has been fired from his job.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman plan to do?

script:
� I heard that Larry's going to be leaving the company next month.
� Really? Why? Where is he going?
� His wife got a job in Colorado. The whole family will be moving.
� Well, I'll miss him, but it sounds like a step up for him. We'll have to have a going-away party!
